getBaseFertility

public java.lang.Integer getBaseFertility()
Description copied from interface: Tile
Returns the base fertility (i.e. potential output) of the tile. This is the initial fertility of the land tile, computed as a function of elevation and proximity to fresh water, that remains constant.

Specified by:
getBaseFertility in interface Tile
Returns:
the base fertility, in bushels per turn.

getAdjustedFertility

public java.lang.Integer getAdjustedFertility()
Description copied from interface: Tile
Returns the adjusted fertility (i.e. potential output) of the tile. This is the current fertility of the land tile, which may be lower than the base fertility as a result of cobalt bombing or other effect.

Specified by:
getAdjustedFertility in interface Tile
Returns:
the adjusted fertility, in bushels per turn.
